properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Blessed Redeemer, Precious Redeemer Seems Now I See Him On Calvary’s Tree Wounded And Bleeding, For Sinners Pleading Blind And Unheeding, Dying For Me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Up Calvary’s Mountain One Dreadful Morn Walked Christ My Saviour, Weary And Worn Facing For Sinners Death On The Cross That He Might Save Them From Endless Loss{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}“Father, Forgive Them,” My Saviour Prayed Even While His Lifeblood Flowed Fast Away Praying For Sinners While In Such Woe No One But Jesus Ever Loved So{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh How I Love Him, Saviour And Friend How Can My Praises Ever Find End Through Years Unnumbered On Heaven’s Shore My Songs Shall Praise Him Forevermore.{/lang-eng}
